text: Ana zupa Josua'a vuno ranra zaferinagrerafane Anaki vahe'ma agona ramimpima nemaniza vahera ha' huzmanteno zamahehana hu'ne. Ana vahe'ma nemaniza kumatamina, Hebronima, Debirima, Anabuma, Judama me'nea agona ramimpine Israelima me'nea agona ramimpima nemaniza vahera Josua'a ana maka zamahe vaganereno, rankuma zaminena eri haviza hu'ne.
